name: One More Thing
description:
One More Thing is a platformer game where each level increases in difficulty.

The game is pretty short but it's my first game.  I'm a teenager who is into coding and decided to make a game as a hobby.  Hope you enjoy it!

Note: I was having trouble getting the HTML5 player to work in Safari.  If you're on a Mac, try another browser or download the game.

This game was made in the Godot Engine.  Please let me know if you have any issues with the game itself, HTML5 player, or Windows/Mac downloads.
